reference.title: choice
reference.shortdesc: Each <choice> element describes one way that the user could accomplish the current step.

section.title: Contains
section.p: The content model of this element may differ based on where it is used. Content model information is located here:

section.title: Contained By
section.p: The parents of this element may differ based on where it is used. Content model information is located here:

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <step><cmd>Choose a server.</cmd> <choices> <choice>If you have a remote server you want to test on, type the IP address or hostname of the server here.</choice> <choice>If you want to do local testing, just type localhost.</choice> </choices> </step>
